name: Bewitch the Sandwich
description:
Perfect for having fun with your friends and kill your nothing-to-do time.

Bewitch the Sandwich is a 3D top-down local party game; fast-paced, casual and with simple mechanics. You will play as one of our show’s contestants, competing in different game modes against your friends.

Don't hesitate to leave a comment with your opinions on the game, to inform us about weird bugs, show some love or even make suggestions!

Have fun playing!
